website_summaries.verdict: Richly flavored, 12-ounce dark roast ground coffee, USDA certified organic and fair trade certified.
pros: An intensely flavorful organic coffee, USDA Certified Organic and Fair Trade Certified, with notes of dark cocoa and brown sugar
Manufacturer claims they select only the top 2% of all Arabica raw coffee beans worldwide, to ensure quality and flavor
cons: On the expensive side at over $15 a pound

customer_reviews.title: THIS is GOOD coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is good coffee my friends. I have worked on organic shade grown canopy coffee farms as a laborer, and I've been a barista, and I've lived with an Italian coffee drinker. This is well made coffee. Do NOT buy other online Amazon coffee until you've tried this.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing "dessert" espresso
customer_reviews.text: Amazing "dessert" espresso. I use this in my Jura a9 and the coffee/espresso it produces is amazing. I prefer a smooth, chocolatey flavor profile for my coffee and espresso so this blend definitely hits the mark. It's smooth, sweet, and full bodied. It does lose a little bit of the body once you add milk, but most people won't notice. Really good "starter" espresso for those who are trying to get into it. Easy to drink and not super complex in terms of identifying all the different notes/aromas. Crema is also really good for these beans! I haven't tried any Lavazza roasts, but we tried Stumptown, Kean Coffee, Intelligencia, and death wish before settling on Wild Jo.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Better than Starbucks
customer_reviews.text: I like a dark roast that has a smooth flavor. I typically drink Sumatra at Starbucks or Dark Magic with Green Mountain. I've found a cheaper, tastier version of all the things I love about coffee. Score!! Great letter from seller prior to purchase arrival. They refund your money on the off chance you don't like it since Amazon does not take open food/drink packages. I'm brewing a cup now!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Box

customer_reviews.title: Always tasty
customer_reviews.text: Jo coffee is our everyday special go to morning brew. I normally buy whole bean, I must have been in a hurry when I purchased it ground ~ I was relieved that getting ground didn't change the awesome flavor of this perfect coffee that all 5 in the household enjoy! I've been buying the Jo coffees for years now. I still try other coffees from time to time, but this one never disappoints. Good to the last drop
customer_reviews.author: Monica A

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless Coffee and not strong
customer_reviews.text: We did not like that coffee. We gave a try and we got stuck with flavorless coffee . The coffee is not strong as much as we put more coffee to brew. We like Sumatra from Starbucks or Death Wish or Kicking Horse. These are all good. This is was an experience . It will go back in the closet . I would never buy this coffee again.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Dark and smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my favorite coffee. I’ve been drinking it for a while now and find it very hard to buy any other coffee brand. It’s smooth, and dark without any bitter tastes. I only put a slight bit of half and half in my coffee and like that it can hold its dark color and taste. It’s a bit expensive and I drink it everyday so I buy a lot, that’s the only drawback. All organic coffees are expensive tho so it’s expected. At least this one is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love good coffee. This is one of the best brands I have found, very full-bodied and rich. More importantly, I had quit drinking coffee because it triggers very bad gastric reflux, even high priced organic brands. I bought this coffee when my nephew, a coffee addict, was visiting. It smelled so good and he raved about it, so I braved a cup. Now I have been drinking one to two cups a day for almost a month, with no acid reflux. I don't know what they do differently with this coffee, but I am really grateful to be able to drink coffee again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Jane

customer_reviews.title: Packing Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've had my fair share of dark roast coffees over the years. I was quite surpised at the amount of flvor this coffee is packing. I bought some kicking horse brand dark roasted coffee on here and was highly dissapointed. The coffee when brewed is dark, robust and full of flavor. You don't need much cream and sugar with this coffee. This is heaven on the taste buds. I higly recommend wild Jo coffee.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Loved this coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is very tasty. Although it is a dark roast, there is no acidic taste or bitterness. I re-ordered right away. It’s going to be one of my new favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. JL

customer_reviews.title: Bitter to the last drop
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were excited to try a coffee with reduced acid, so after receiving our package in the mail we immediately brewed a pot. Oh so disappointing. It was overly bitter, one dimensional, and all around bad coffee. We usually don't write reviews of a product that is subjective to our own taste, however, we wanted to warn people about this brand. If you don't like their coffee you can not return it. Which I feel is indicative of a company that knows its products are inferior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hello, WILD JO Organic Coffee with Bold Coffee Taste!
customer_reviews.text: Very very good Coffee. Your taste buds will long for the rich bold flavors of WILD JO. Tastes like Coffee. Buy a bag and say hello to your favorite new coffee. Smooth, rich flavor. It will blow your mind with the mouth watering flavor. We make cappuccinos, lattes and iced coffee with WILD JO. It's Organic and the beans are as fresh as a Spring morning! Highly Recommended. Excellent Flavor. Top of our Coffee List.
customer_reviews.author: CaitlynOnTheFly

customer_reviews.title: Not as rich as expected
customer_reviews.text: Well, Its a good coffee! But, not as bold as I was hoping. Balanced flavor and the last bit in each cup was ever so slightly acidic. I am using an Aeropress for brewing. I will enjoy the bag, but will not purchase again. I will experiment with my brewing a little more and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: M. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great Organic Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an organic coffee as I can't tolerate anything grown where Roundup is used. This brand of coffee was recommended to me as certified organic. I bought the Bold Dark even though I like mild coffee as some of the reviews said the original was too mild. I make a big cup of coffee with this and I love it!! AND it doesn't flair up my IBS!! It doesn't have a bitter taste ever! It might cost more but worth every bit of it!! I can enjoy my coffee again!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn from mid Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is my "weekend" coffee, when I can actually relax in the early morning hours with a cup. It just makes my day happy -- such GOOD coffee!!! I ordered, also, a two pound bag to get me through the California "shelter-in-home" "isolate at home" phase, figuring a GREAT cup of coffee would lift my spirits daily! It works!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Just blah
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After reading all these great reviews, I was excited to try this coffee. First taste and was shocked. Not strong, not bold and not rich!! Just plain blah. Honestly, it tasted extremely bitter, not that strong coffee flavor I crave. Will keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy82

customer_reviews.title: Morning with JO
customer_reviews.text: This is my first order of JO coffee. I usually drink Death Wish coffee but it was going to take a little longer for that order and JO was to arrive sooner and I was OUT OF COFFEE! So JO caught my eye and and I said I’ll give it a try. I’m glad I did! Though I must add more grounds per 6 ounce cup than with my usual brand of coffee I must say it is very GOOD! Nice flavor and no bitterness. So give it a try. I don’t think you will be disappointed but if you are they offer a refund. So let me go and drink my JO.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret P Lawson

customer_reviews.title: not good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhh... should have stuck with my normal coffee, tried this... you know the feeling of a holiday inn that puts new paint on the walls and has new modern furniture? but inside its core is still a holiday inn? that feeling is what this coffee tastes like. not good. extremely disappointed. clueless as to the five star reviews. If you enjoy staying st a holiday inn, this coffee is for you. I’d rather take a cat nap in the car and keep driving.
customer_reviews.author: RiderRide

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband because he had been unhappy with the lack of flavor of every other coffee I've brought home. I've bought lots of different kinds. After reading lots of reviews here on Amazon I decided to try this brand. My husband said it has a smooth taste and he likes it. I did not even coach him to say smooth lol. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee with no upset
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave a 4 Star was it didn't come vacuum sealed. The coffee was fresh though and Christmas time shipping probably it was tossed around, etc. I can drink this coffee without IBS flare up :) I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn from mid Michigan

customer_reviews.title: though if you like strong coffee
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised some reviews say this coffee is weak, as it's quite strong and robust in my opinion! I use it with my Chemex pour over coffee drip. I'm actually going to use the same brand of a less strong one next time I order, just to switch things up. Wild Jo is delicious, though if you like strong coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Visionology

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee for a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try something new, so I decided to try out this brand as it was affordable and looked interesting. I brewed my first cup with a french press (one of my favorite ways to brew coffee) and it turned out amazing! It was very smooth and easy to drink with a rich, nutty taste with some smokey after-hints. I worked for Starbucks for almost four years, and I would say this akin to their higher end coffees, maybe even close to their Reserve coffees. You can't beat this for the price! I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, Strong Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is closest to Starbucks if you are into their coffee! The only other coffee I enjoy is Bustelo. Wild Jo opened bag smells strong and is fresh. The flavor smells light, but very robust dancing on my taste buds. I cannot believe I found the wake up coffee of my dreams for the house. Worth the price and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not a true French roast
customer_reviews.text: Minimal aroma upon opening, wayyyyy too light to be considered a dark roast let alone a true French roast. I can ever so slightly taste some sort of smokiness flavor but if your a fan of a true French roast you will be disappointed. I bought this coffee because it was organic French roast but It just doesn’t get the job done. I feel as though this coffee was roasted for the masses (mild flavor, little to no body). It’s not terrible coffee it just doesn’t meet my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Devin Bradford

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite coffee. I am a bit of a coffee snob and I love dark roasts. This one ticks off all the boxes for deep, rich, and complex flavor, plus it does not give me an acid stomach so I can drink it black.
customer_reviews.author: Thistle

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Jo coffee together with fairly serious contenders - in a bid to break the unavoidable coffee blahs that comes with a mainstream coffee source for too long. I was happily surprise to award it the best of four samples, hands-down. This will definitely be a repeat purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Helene Villemure

customer_reviews.title: Minus one star for cost
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee I've had outside a coffee shop but it's expensive for how much coffee you get. Would definitely help if they could bring down the price a bit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dark Roast on the Market
customer_reviews.text: When you picture a good, classic French roast, Wild Jo is what comes to mind. I'm usually not picky on taste/flavors of good quality beans and grounds, but the notes of cocoa and brown sugar stood out as being a particularly nice note of sweetness that gave it a homely feel. The grounds cold brew, french press, and aeropress very well but I loved it in the form of cold brew and will keep buying it for that purpose. The only downside is the price, but the larger 2lb bag is better value for the money and since I have no complaints with the grounds whatsoever, I'm willing to pay the price premium.
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Holben

customer_reviews.title: Finally organic coffee with taste!
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase was the natural decaffeinated No-Fun-Jo coffee, which was incredibly good. This is my second purchase of the Wild-Jo dark roast (has caffeine). The scent was earthy with dark chocolate notes. The taste is boldly rich and a trace bitter after-note. Love both and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Wicked Good Coffee!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste! I love Cuban coffee-strong expresso. This is so rich tasting! I used it for my Ket Coffee. It tastes great with the Keto additives, but I tried it alone too. Full bodied, Wicked Good! Great Caffeine Kick. No acidy stomach upset for me. Quick Shipping! AAAAA+++++
customer_reviews.author: GO

customer_reviews.title: black is black
customer_reviews.text: Really good bold french roast flavor but not harsh. Dark and rich! Smooth tasting with a great aroma. A rewarding way to start your morning!
customer_reviews.author: CG Veach

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee, strong like it should be
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this coffee.. I would buy more routinely if I didn't frequent coffee shops, where I can enjoy company.. It's a quality organic dark coffee.. If you use good water, as I do, it comes out very smooth being that it is organic.. I have reverse osmosis water and it makes the coffee come out even better. Dark, smooth, rich taste! Being a vegan I use cashew milk to smooth it out on occasion and make an iced coffee too.. delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Neal Vanderstelt

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor - Always fresh
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this coffee for about a year now. Need I say more?! Okay, I will. It just has a nice flavor, bold, fresh, no horrible after taste. I’ve been trying different coffees for Many years, and there are some good one out there. I occasionally buy one of my other favorites, but Jo is my every day, long term favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C. Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pour-over coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I used to grind my own beans etc, but found I like the convenience of pre-ground coffee. I also prefer to make my coffee pour-over style rather than as a whole pot. I find this coffee is strong enough and rich enough in flavor to buy pre-ground. I love it and will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Dark
customer_reviews.text: Best dark roast organic coffee I’ve ever experienced. It truly is fresh and has a nutty wonderful taste. My favorite drip coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Rezonator

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only coffee I'll buy! I used to love going to a cafe and having an americano, but now no other coffee is good enough! I used to hate black coffee, but this brand is so smooth and easy to drink that I haven't even bought milk in weeks! I've bought so many bags for people who've visited my house and commented how good the coffee is. I am 10000% in love!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality
customer_reviews.text: The bold flavors of this coffee stand in a league of their own. I highly recommend this coffee to people who enjoy the taste of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kern

customer_reviews.title: Rich and Smooth but Not as Strong as I Prefer
customer_reviews.text: It's good coffee. You know it's a premium coffee from the first sip. Personally, I was hoping it would have a bit more of a dark roast 'kick' to it. I use a stove-top moka express to make my coffee which always brews a strong cup. Few methods make stronger coffee. So, for me at least, its richness and smoothness but lack of a real 'kick' makes it more of a mid-day or even an evening coffee, rather than a morning brew.
customer_reviews.author: jimmyD

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. I am quite picky when it comes to my coffee and this passed the test. Will be purchasing over and over again. :) The underlying flavors that are listed on the package, definitely describe the flavor correctly-- specifically the decaffeinated version. I refuse to drink anything else now. I drink A LOT of coffee (mainly caffeinated, but because my addiction has become so heavy, I now include decaf) and want it to be organic.....this brand surpasses the bar. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I expected a stronger flavor and a finer grind. The taste was pleasant with minimal bitterness and after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Proves Not All Coffee Is Created Equal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coffee. I had bought a bag and loved it, then had bought a different coffee (not Jo) and just wanted to use it up fast so I could then re-order this Jo coffee again which I did. There's something different about it, and whatever they do definitely creates a distinctive taste. I prefer to buy organic whenever I can, and between the taste and that this is organic, it has everything I'm looking for in a coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Vince G

customer_reviews.title: Assuaged!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy "good" coffee and recognize that like beauty, liking is in the "eyes" of the beholder. I have been a Raven's brew fan for years and hold it as a preferred taste...dark roast yet smooth and flavorful. This brew is different yet similar, without the sharp and bitter flavors of many other dark roasts. It is good both as a black coffee but strong enough to be melded with cream and still stand out. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Coffee I looked forward to in the morning - bright, full-flavored brew.
customer_reviews.author: pb

customer_reviews.title: Robust and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I had Wild Jo sometime back at an Airbnb and bought some when I got home, gifted it to my son whom I just surprised with another package. We both like robust coffee that isn’t bitter and this meets the criteria!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lee

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER IN 40 YEARS! AND IT'S ORGANIC.....NOTHING BEATS THIS COFFEE!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tasted a life time of coffees, from instant, freeze dried, all coffee from whole foods market, trader joes, Peets, you name it, I've tried it!!!!! Just moved from CA to AZ, have been restocking my kitchen, looked around for an Organic coffee on Amazon, top rated...BOY JACK POT!!!!...if you love a really, really good cup you cannt go wrong, try it !!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bucceri-Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim during Prime Days; terrifically pleasant surprise to find this coffee to be tasty, fresh, cost-effective, and great quality. Definitely will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Love this blend for cold brewing. Its good for hot brewing but cold is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gee

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee has excellent taste! It's smooth and for organic I like the price. I have read that coffee is one of the highest pesticide products of the food and drink we consume so organic coffee is important for me. A must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Caffeine kick
customer_reviews.text: I'm a casual coffee drinker, but on the mornings when I need a caffeine kick this coffee grounds does the trick. It works well with my french press, I never get the grounds in my cup of coffee. Smells and taste delicious, will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good hot or even luke warm
customer_reviews.text: We tried this Jo coffee today, and it was really good , but I had some things to get done this morning, so I left my coffee cup out and when I came back to take a sip it was just warm - low and behold...... it still tasted great! In fact, I think it might have been a little bit more flavorful. Good stuff !
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: Wild Jo is Truly Dark Roast
customer_reviews.text: I use this coffee to make my Bulletproof coffee every morning! When I am forced to buy coffee away from home, that is when I truly appreciate the intensity but smooth flavor of this coffee. I was looking for an organic, fair trade coffee that I did not have to grind and I am so happy that I found this coffee by Specialty Java Inc. Give this coffee a try, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Forest Panzy

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I'm a very picky coffee drinker. Unfortunately this wasn't a favorite for me. I like dark roasts. This didn't have a bang when I drank it. I was surprised after reading the other reviews
customer_reviews.author: Mary a pennington

customer_reviews.title: NOT French Roast.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the description states “French Roast”. After brewing the first day, it seemed very underwhelming. On day two I see the bag delivered does not have French roast written on it, nor does it taste like French Roast. Apparently the description may be false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Devito III

customer_reviews.title: Sold customer
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several brands of organic coffee on Amazon and they are always too weak for my preference. This is the second bag I have ordered from this company qne I have loved both roasts although I prefer this one more just because I love strong coffee. Its rich and perfect for my French press or my drip. I plan on adding this to my regular delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra M. Roser

customer_reviews.title: Strong bold taste
customer_reviews.text: Originally i reviewed the wrong coffee and said this didn't taste good, i was talking about another kind not this one. Makes a very good flavorful cup of coffee. Not for someone who likes light coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Hodge

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is like water, but with a horrendous aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I often think reviews are paid for. This is one of those times. This stuff is like water, but with a horrendous aftertaste. I was shocked....it has ZERO flavor. Not bold. No caffeine. Just tastes like bad water. Dont believe all the raving reviews, this stuff is a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: celt67

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee I have bought in years, my new favorite. I have been looking for a reasonably priced organic coffee for years and this is finally the one. The flavor is great, it is healthy, and it leaves you alert without jitters. I got some for my mom and now she has switched from her very expensive Nespresso machine, to a French press with Jo. We are both converts.
customer_reviews.author: Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sip
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a pour over coffee carafe for my desk at work and wanted an organic ground coffee to use. I tried Wild Jo because of the reviews and the flavor profile listed in the specs. It was love at first sip. I am typically a one cup a day girl but this (paired with my pour over carafe) makes me want to drink several cups throughout the day. I'm glad I discovered this wonderful cup of Jo(e). The aroma upon first opening the package is absolutely intoxicating. This will definitely be my go to coffee from this point forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very flavorful
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in this coffee. I was expecting a bold coffee taste, and it just seemed bland to me. It was on the pricey side and I have to use twice as much. Just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase of this product! Had family and friends all comment recently that this was some of the best coffee they have had. My wife and I like dark roasted coffee to begin with and this exceeds our expectations of a full bodied, deep roasted coffee. Great hints of chocolate without any bitter notes. We have read several articles on non organic coffee being one of the top agricultural products that are sprayed with pesticides. One more great reason for buying WILD JO organic coffee!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee in my house. It's the only one we use.
customer_reviews.author: HDragonesse

customer_reviews.title: We have no choice with your offers
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very light coffee! Nothing compares to SIERRA EXPRESÓ BEENS COFFE !! Fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Bollero

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I am a coffee snob, it has to be rich, smooth and delicious. Today was the first day I had this brand of coffee. I drove to work with a HUGE smile on my face, sipping this coffee and thoroughly enjoying my commute. It's a great way to start a Monday. Looking forward to enjoying it the whole week through. It's the little things that make our day, and this coffee is IT!
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Great strong coffee without bitterness!
customer_reviews.text: The best coffee money can buy. I like strong coffee but not bitter. This is it. ,
customer_reviews.author: David King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dark Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I've just recently discovered this coffee, and it's really delicious. I have almost a fetish about good coffee, and I'm hard to please, and this kind does it. It's deep and dark without being in the least bitter -- perfect. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Noel

customer_reviews.title: not as acidic as regular coffer and taste great. I won't be drinking pesticide filled coffee any ...
customer_reviews.text: It taste so clean, it makes you want to make it stronger. not as acidic as regular coffer and taste great. I won't be drinking pesticide filled coffee any more. This is the way coffee is suppose to taste without those chemicals. I can't believe I didn't try it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Joel C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great taste & for the price you can't beat it! I use this in my french press daily and love it!!
customer_reviews.author: niccolle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Keurig 2.0 Brewer
customer_reviews.text: I have the Keurig Brewer, with the 2.0 cups and I use the 2.0 individual cup and buy the filters. This is more economical, but to find a coffee that will not taste like water is difficult. This coffee does the trick although a little high in cost, I found it elsewhere for less; not the same brand, and still organic.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mowrey BMTop Contributor: Karaoke

customer_reviews.title: Taste, delish!
customer_reviews.text: I am a coffee fanatic- OMG, this coffee is so delicious, I will definitely see if I can purchase it on my subscriber list. If not, I’ll be buying it monthly. Excellent taste, dark-roasted but smooth. So happy I decided to try it. I actually ordered 3 more for Thanksgiving gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Trish V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong flavor
customer_reviews.text: I thought the taste is nice and full and I enjoy brewing nice strong pots of this coffee in order to get the most flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Really delish coffee
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Flavor-Will be ordering again. You get a lot of what tastes like coffee house premium coffee for a good value. It has a golf flavor, with a smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rutman

customer_reviews.title: My buddy highly recommends it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good coffee. A friend of mine liked it and I gave it to him as I prefer another brand but he loved it so much he asked for it for his birthday so purchased again. I drink iced coffee and he drinks it hot and black. Says it’s got a fantastic taste.
customer_reviews.author: Мартин

customer_reviews.title: Nice nose, poor pour
customer_reviews.text: I've tried numerous ways to prepare this coffee and I can not get even close to a decent cup. In the bag the nose is great but it does not transfer when brewed. Maybe I got a bad batch but I can only review what I have and would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M. - Va, USA

customer_reviews.title: I like the JO whole beans more than the grind (the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the JO whole beans more than the grind (the grind is not fine enough). I'm now grinding KICK - a little less oily, but dark and also great. I combine it in a paper filter - with a fine-grind Costa Rican regular roast (BRITT Terrazu, Montecito) that is delicious and smooth, but I've been yearning lately for a darker, more caffeinated cup, so enter the dark beans. I usually drink a five-cup pot in the AM. I will get more JO beans.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Jo coffee review
customer_reviews.text: Great cup of coffee! Colds must have liked it!!! All gone
customer_reviews.author: Alexfig

customer_reviews.title: great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, dark, and strong with a nutty chocolate finish. I am a coffee freak. Love this coffee
customer_reviews.author: KLA

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This brand is the best! The medium roast and the dark roast are very impressive- top notch coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Kristybee

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this coffee because the brand I normally buy was not in stock. One cup converted me. I get teased for being a coffee snob, so I had doubts when I placed my order ... but this is amazing. Dark but not bitter, truly rich. These beans are the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: Writer Grrrl

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Very good! I hate coffee but actually look forward to this with a little MCT oil!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Organic👍 & great flavor👏
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find rich flavored organic coffee, but this one is really good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love your coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Full bodied, robust taste and quite enjoyable. We love waking up to the smell of Wild Jo organic dark roast. Just turned on the neighbors with a complimentary bag of your goods. We had ordered 2 bags and gave one away. Hopefully they will enjoy, can't imagine it being any other way. Thank you for your product.
customer_reviews.author: Ninna

customer_reviews.title: good strong cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: I got what I wanted even though a bit expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Goods not Returnable
customer_reviews.text: This was received with a puncture hole in the coffee bag so unable to use and disposed. This is the 3rd bag of coffee received with a puncture hole. It's not able to be returned so how am I compensated?
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: The beans are really oily and dark just the way we like it. The bag is always fresh and has ...
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is delicious! The beans are really oily and dark just the way we like it. The bag is always fresh and has notes of mocha. The seller is very concerned to make sure that you have the best cup of coffee out there. You can't beat the price for Organic, Whole Bean French Roasted coffee.
customer_reviews.author: hitthepositive

customer_reviews.title: Coffee past sell by.
customer_reviews.text: Package was two weeks past sell by date. Don't expect fresh. I know sell by is still OK to consume but if you want fresh coffee, like roasted within a few days, pass, or get somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Roselle

customer_reviews.title: Smells and tastes delicious
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is delicious.. I have ordered it a second time and will order again. Tastes as good as it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Bohemian_diamond

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the ground version by mistake
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the "ground" version by mistake. I had received the "whole bean" version as a gift and would give it a 5 star rating. Unfortunately I had opened the ground coffee bag, so I didn't feel right returning it. I like the ground version but it isn't nearly as good as the whole bean. I recommend that you buy a coffee bean grinder and grind the whole bean version. This is generally true for any coffee but especially the Wild Jo version.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Crum

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste and aroma of this coffee. The price is great for a 2lbs bag too.
customer_reviews.author: arnoldo  montenegro

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee I’ve ever had. I drink coffee all day and have tried all the specialty coffees offered on Amazon. None of them can come close to this coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Bold" is a bit of an overstatement
customer_reviews.text: I read the previous reviews about this coffee, especially those saying that the mild was weak. So I got the dark, hoping for at least mild. Sadly, I wouldn't classify it as even mild. I am not a coffee connoisseur, so my tastes fall into categories of "would buy again" and "would not buy again." This is the latter. It's not a bad coffee, but if you're looking for something with a fuller body, you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect French Roast: smooth and non-acidic
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coffee so much I just ordered another bag. First of all, it smells to me like coffee should. Secondly, it is a deep, dark French Roast that isn’t acidic. I am not that scientific when it comes to measuring but I like my coffee strong. It is smooth and non-acidic. Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Family favorite
customer_reviews.text: The family loves it. I have to continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ENRIQUE GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: it's an excellent coffee, a tasty rich blend and thoroughly enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of Wild Jo Dark French Roast., it's an excellent coffee, a tasty rich blend and thoroughly enjoyable. Arrived well packed and on time. It's as good or better than any of the coffees I've purchased in the specialty coffee shops in my neighborhood. I'm happy and looking forward to trying other blends.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good smooth coffee 💚
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to drink his coffee black and is very particular about getting his coffee fresh from the local roaster. I bought this for him to compare and he actually liked this better. Will definitely be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cup of jo
customer_reviews.text: My husband said he loved the coffee Great flavor His name is Joe, and it was a Christmas gift :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This coffee was excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I tried this new coffee last week and really enjoyed it. We're heavy coffee drinkers and can't start the day right if the coffee isn't right. We'll be ordering more in the weeks to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Brian Glenney

customer_reviews.title: overpriced, just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing special, just run of the mill french roast.... a bit hi priced for the quality/complexity..... maybe the whole bean would be better.... (french press, shared with project friends, consensus from all)...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Luvr

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth wonderful coffee!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely loved this coffee! This coffee has a great flavor that is very smooth with no bitter after taste. It smells wonderful in the bag and at brewing time. I'm going to purchase more for myself and gifts for the coffee lovers in my life. Highly recommend....
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Short

customer_reviews.title: Great in aero press and in Keurig, with Superior flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious flavor and fast shipping! Flavor is so good I love to drink it black with no additives.
customer_reviews.author: GrowHuntFish

customer_reviews.title: Who in Minnesota Says "Wicked Good Coffee"?
customer_reviews.text: I've been very pleased with my orders from Jo Coffee, comparable to other premium brands like Starbucks and Peets. Roasted in Waconia, MN, did you hire some guy from Massachusetts as your marketing director?
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Great strong coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent flavorful and intense- as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bananarama

product_meta.title: WILD JO: 12 oz, Dark French Roast Organic Coffee, Ground Coffee, Bold Strong Rich Wicked Good Coffee! Great Brewed or Cold Brew, USDA Certified Fair Trade Organic Arabica Coffee, NON-GMO Gluten Free
feature_bullets: WILD JO PROFESSIONAL CUPPING NOTES: INTENSE | DARK COCOA | DARK BROWN SUGAR | NO FLAVORING ADDED | Descriptive terms are simply subtle undertones in the coffee itself and no flavors are added.
Each batch of this fresh roasted organic coffee is hand-crafted, by artisan coffee roasters, in our micro-roastery.

Available in 12 oz or a 2 lb money-saving package, both packaged with resealable tin-tie for convenient storage. We recommend using 2 tablespoons of ground coffee to 6 oz of water for optimal extraction with most brewing methods.

Our organic coffee is specialty grade coffee, which is the top 2% specialty grade of organic Arabica raw coffee. This specialty grade coffee is sourced worldwide through direct sourcing and through a dedicated team of coffee cupping experts. Not all coffee is created equal.
This coffee is USDA Certified Organic, Fair Trade Certified, and Kosher Certified.
